messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Offer package.
What does the Monthly Extreme Offer package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Monthly Extreme Offer package?

The Monthly Extreme Offer package includes 50GB of internet (25GB usable from 1AM to 9AM), 7500 on-net minutes, 600 off-net minutes, and 5000 SMS for Rs. 1040 including tax. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *708#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Offer package.
How can I activate the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
How do I get the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
You can activate the Monthly Extreme Offer package by dialing *708#. The package offers 50GB of internet, 7500 on-net minutes, 600 off-net minutes, and 5000 SMS for 30 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Offer package.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Extreme Offer package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Extreme Offer package.
How long is the Monthly Extreme Offer package valid?
What is the validity period of the Monthly Extreme Offer package?
For how many days does the Monthly Extreme Offer package remain active?
The Monthly Extreme Offer package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
